New Records: JJ Smit's record of 51 T20I sixes for Namibia was broken by Gerhard Erasmus
Key Match Events: Scotland won by 5 wickets (with 9 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Gerhard Erasmus expressed disappointment at not winning the match despite his all-round performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados
Others: Richie Berrington and Michael Leask were the top scorers for Scotland with 47 and 35 runs respectively
